sentence: In early trading on Thursday, shares of Nike ( NKE ) topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 1.1%.
Year to date, Nike registers a 9.3% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Walt Disney ( DIS ), trading down 0.4%.
Walt Disney is showing a gain of 8.0% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Procter & Gamble ( PG ), trading down 0.4%, and Caterpillar ( CAT ), trading up 0.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
